summary.p: Recommends Bullinger the bearer of the letter, a citizen of Schaffhausen. Ritter will personally convey further news upon his next visit.

div.p: The one who delivers my letter to you is a citizen of Schaffhausen, born of a not insignificant family, who wishes to fulfill the duty of a scribe. Therefore, whatever advice and assistance you provide to him, consider it as given to me. As for the matters that concern us, or rather Christ, you will understand them when I come in person.
To the distinguished in piety and learning Heinrich Bullinger, proclaiming the Gospel of Christ in Zurich, dearest brother.
